long_description: The Snow Peak HotLips let you sip straight from your Snow Peak single-wall mug or pot without having to worry about burning your lips. HotLips are designed specifically for the Snow Peak 600 mug and the Trek 900 and 1400 pots (all sold separately); will also fit on the rim of many Snow Peak single-wall mugs. Silicone material stays cool to the touch so you won't burn your lips; silicone won't melt under normal use and is heat resistant to 446degF. With the use of HotLips, you can reheat a hot drink in your single-wall Snow Peak mug directly over a stove and then place the HotLips on your mug to immediately start sipping. Do not leave HotLips on the mug while heating over an open flame. Package of 2 Snow Peak HotLips.
